items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: noUiSlider is a lightweight, ARIA-accessible JavaScript range slider with multi-touch and keyboard support. It is fully GPU animated: no reflows, so it is fast; even on older devices. It also fits wonderfully in responsive designs and has no dependencies.
items.title: leongersen/noUiSlider: noUiSlider is a lightweight, ARIA-accessible JavaScript range slider with multi-touch and keyboard support. It is fully GPU animated: no reflows, so it is fast; even on older devices. It also fits wonderfully in responsive designs and has no dependencies.

items.content_html: A lightweight node js bot that is runing jobs by specific cron times. It is build to run async/sync nodejs scripts with child processes to do the jobs
items.title: devUgur/node-bot-01: A lightweight node js bot that is runing jobs by specific cron times. It is build to run async/sync nodejs scripts with child processes to do the jobs

items.content_html: The Random Number Generator is a lightweight and easy-to-use npm package that allows you to generate random numbers within a specified range. It provides a simple and reliable solution for incorporating random number generation into your Node.js applications.
items.title: avinashtare/express_random_numbers_generator: The Random Number Generator is a lightweight and easy-to-use npm package that allows you to generate random numbers within a specified range. It provides a simple and reliable solution for incorporating random number generation into your Node.js applications.

items.title: usebruno/bruno: Opensource IDE For Exploring and Testing Api's (lightweight alternative to postman/insomnia)

items.content_html: Introducing the "Local Notes" web application: A simple and efficient way to create, store and manage your notes right in your web browser. This lightweight application allows you to jot down your thoughts, to-do lists or important information with ease. With a clean and user-friendly interface you can organize your notes and edit them on the fly.
items.title: PeterKaa1/Local-Notes: Introducing the "Local Notes" web application: A simple and efficient way to create, store and manage your notes right in your web browser. This lightweight application allows you to jot down your thoughts, to-do lists or important information with ease. With a clean and user-friendly interface you can organize your notes and edit them on the fly.
